name: Vimeo Import
description: Imports videos from Vimeo to the Koken library.
description_long: These options define the default settings for all imported Vimeo videos.

username.label: Name
username.info: Your Vimeo account name. You may find this at Vimeo through My Settings > Account.

assign_tag.label: Assign "vimeo" tag to all imported videos
assign_tag.info: This will assign a Koken tag named "vimeo" to everything imported from Vimeo. Handy for viewing all imported Vimeo videos on your site.

tags.label: Assign tags from Vimeo
tags.info: Automatically imports the assigned tags from Vimeo.

portrait.label: Show portrait on videos
portrait.info: Displays the video author's avatar in the Vimeo player's pre-playback state.

title.label: Show title on videos
title.info: Displays the video title in the Vimeo player's pre-playback state.

byline.label: Show byline on videos
byline.info: Displays the video's byline in the Vimeo player's pre-playback state.

autoplay.label: Autoplay videos
autoplay.info: All imported videos will automatically playback in the Vimeo player.

loop.label: Loop videos
loop.info: All imported videos will restart instead of stopping in the Vimeo player.

color.label: Color
color.info: Color of the title, buttons and other elements in the Vimeo player.
